attributes.long-description:
Happy Drummer is easy to play, you will not see any UI in the game, you could really interact with this virtual world. There are 2 scenes and a total of 12 pieces of music with 3 difficulties. You can create your own notes and become a great performer, to ask your friends to follow it and try it out. Please remember that only the complete combo makes you the God of the drums. Then, keep practicing and having fun in the fantastic world of the drum!

All the music of the game was made to measure by different composers all over the world, perfectly mixed with your vision, they take you to a world of totally immersive hordes. All the successes in the game were designed and established with precision, we want our player not only to experience the joy of the combined successes, but also to feel the charm of true horde music. In addition to playing the notes correctly, you also have possibilities of solos freely. Then try and impress!

1 player
450MB minimum save size
PlayStation®VR Required
PlayStation®Camera Required
2 PS®Move controllers required

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

©Shanghai Lusion Computer Software Co. Ltd. All rights reserved
